doc.field: Brooklyn and Bronx lodges of the Vasa Order of America records
Brooklyn and Bronx lodges of the Vasa Order of America records
Series 8: The Independent Order of Vikings
Series 8: The Independent Order of Vikings

This series contains material from the Independent Order of Vikings and other Scandinavian-American organizations covering the period 1908 to 1951. The bulk of the series relates to lodge Agne #101 of the Independent Order of Vikings, which was based in Brooklyn and also met at the Vasa Club on Dean Street. Material pertaining to the Independent Order of Vikings and Agne #101 includes copies of constitutions, bylaws, and amendments from 1923 to 1940; several ritual books from 1909 to 1934; correspondence (mostly in Swedish); membership lists; receipts; and ephemera, 1934 to 1951. The remaining material contains certificates and ephemera from other Swedish-American and Scandinavian-American organizations that have been active in the New York City area. Four certificates from this series are located in the oversize box.
